thread.section_title: Thinking Capital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thinking Capital | thinkingcapital.ca
thread.title: Brian

author: Brian
title: Brian
text:
All I can say is I had given up on getting a loan
That my company desperately needed
My credit score was well let's say I was not mad when I got turned down
I came across thinking capital
I provided the few documents that they needed
All the while thinking I am was wasting my time
Needles to say they came through
I got funded
These guys are understanding and the process was dignified
They make you feel like they understand
